Description.SourceString: A rare perk that increases the effectiveness of most Special Skills, including heals that scale off of ATK. Some Special Abilites do not scale with Hero stats and will not benefit from these perks.
Description.LocalizedString: A rare perk that increases the effectiveness of most Special Skills, including heals that scale off of ATK. Some Special Abilites do not scale with Hero stats and will not benefit from these perks.
